jd: Hello Vendors ,I hope this email finds you well.We are currently seeking a Java API Tech Lead for an exciting opportunity in Dallas, TX(Remote Role) Please review the job details below and let us know if you are interested.Job Title:Java API Tech Lead Location:Dallas, TX(Remote Role)We are looking for USC Candidates only Experienced in designing, developing, integrating, and deploying web services (with REST/SOAP/JSON/XML) using micro services architectureExpert level of Java development experience, including newer versions Expert knowledge of Spring frameworks, including Spring BootExperience with node.js and express.jsExperience designing and documenting APIs with tools such as Swagger, OpenAPIExperience with Java and web services testing tools (ReadyAPI, SOAPUI, Postman, JMeter, etc.)Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, Node.js, or similar.Experience with API management tools (e.g., Apigee, Postman, Swagger).Strong understanding of authentication and authorization mechanisms (e.g., OAuth, JWT). Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and microservices architecture.
